# Logic
<!--
@name: Logic
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/notimp.png" valign="center" alt="Not implemented" title="Not implemented" /></div>

Return a magical number representing the logical buffer of the current screen, to be used in "Screen Copy" and all Screen instructions that necessitate a Screen Index. (deprecated, no such thing as physical or logic al screen in AOZ)
## Parameters

- **index**: The index of the screen
---
